snippet: A co-author of a new Heritage Foundation study highly critical of the Senate’s bipartisan immigration proposal also wrote a doctoral dissertation in which he argued that immigrants generally have an I.Q. that is “substantially lower than that of...
abstract: A co-author of a new Heritage Foundation study highly critical of the Senate’s bipartisan immigration proposal also wrote a doctoral dissertation in which he argued that immigrants generally have an I.Q. that is “substantially lower than that of the white native population.”

byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER and KITTY BENNETT

headline.main: Critic of Immigration Proposal Cited Lower I.Q. of Immigrants in Dissertation
